text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Preservation and Protection and 
other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 
2) Order 2021.

title: and extended the Social Welfare Acts to provide for amendments in relation to
heading: 2. The amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and
text_raw:
2. The amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and 
Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 
1 of 2020) shall continue in operation for the period beginning on the 1st day of 
April 2021 and ending on the 30th day of June 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

23 March, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [133] 5

title: and extended the Social Welfare Acts to provide for amendments in relation to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.155 of 
2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020) from their original expiry date of 9 May 2020 
until 19 June 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 
207 of 2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the 
Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020 until 10 August 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Part 2) (No. 3) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 
285 of 2020) further extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 
2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in 
the Public Interest) Act 2020, to 31 March 2021 as respects sections 4, 5 and 6, 
and to 17 September 2020 as respects sections 7 and 8. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Sections 7 and 8 of Part 2) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 350 of 2020) further extended the operation of the amendments effected 
by sections 7 and 8 of Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and other 
Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020, to 31 December 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of Sections 7 and 8 of Part 2) (No. 2) 
Order 2020 (S.I. No. 740 of 2020) further extended the operation of the 
amendments effected by sections 7 and 8 of Part 2 of the Health (Preservation 
and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020, 
to 31 March 2021. 

This Order extends the amendments effected by Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020, until 30 June 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [133]
